permission.name: user
permission.title: User access only
permission.description: You must pass Bearer token authorization header to access this endpoint.

examples.title: Example usage:
examples.content:
curl -X POST \
  https://driveranalytics.com.br/api/bases/ \
  -H 'authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..PUGy6lPKFz1Kt9Z_pcOOahtCUMjvwSYTIrZdYgGa3xE' \
  -H 'cache-control: no-cache' \
  -H 'content-type: application/json' \
  -d '{
  "nome": "Teste",
  "desc": "Teste"
}'

examples.title: Example usage:
examples.content:
curl -X POST \
  https://driveranalytics.com.br/api/travels/ \
  -H 'authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..PUGy6lPKFz1Kt9Z_pcOOahtCUMjvwSYTIrZdYgGa3xE' \
  -H 'cache-control: no-cache' \
  -H 'content-type: application/json' \
  -d '{
	"inicio": "2019-08-26T21:07:54.789Z",
	"motorista": "5d682ec51b90f3364210d6b8",
	"desc": "Viagem Teste",
	"veiculo": "5d67e4611b90f33642106fa9"
}'

permission.name: user
permission.title: User access only
permission.description: You must pass Bearer token authorization header to access this endpoint.

Parameter.description: Flag para ativar recebimento de email com alertas de Viagem.
Id da empresa do qual o usuário será cadastrado.

examples.title: Example usage:
examples.content:
curl -X POST \
  https://driveranalytics.com.br/api/users/ \
  -H 'authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..PUGy6lPKFz1Kt9Z_pcOOahtCUMjvwSYTIrZdYgGa3xE' \
  -H 'cache-control: no-cache' \
  -H 'content-type: application/json' \
  -d '{
	"email": "teste@teste.com",
	"name": "Teste",
	"receiveEmail": "false",
	"role": "user",
	"password": "teste123",
	"company": "5e41a05a2d2c392c387f9c4b"
  }'
